about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Enjoy a day of childlike wonder in this experience. You start seated on a bench in a botanical garden with the Queen of Hearts spinning slowly in a pond, each turn revealing a new unique piece of the display. As you move into the next retreat, you will find yourself inside of a miniature replica of Notre Dame. Relish in the stunning colors as the sun shines through the magnificent stained glass windows. No childlike dream would be the same without a bright green mossy land meant for magical manifestations.

Purpose
Adventure
Relaxation

Length
10:03

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

name: Exhale XR - Youthful Dreams

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
